name: Classic Navy Blazer
description: A quintessential piece for any gentleman's wardrobe, this classic navy blazer is crafted from premium wool. Featuring a tailored fit, notched lapels, and welt pockets, it's perfect for both formal and smart-casual occasions. Fully lined for comfort.

name: Crisp White Oxford Shirt
description: Elevate your everyday style with our crisp white Oxford shirt. Made from 100% long-staple cotton, it offers exceptional softness and durability. Features a button-down collar, chest pocket, and a comfortable regular fit.

name: Tailored Grey Trousers
description: These tailored grey trousers are a versatile addition to your formalwear collection. Cut from a fine wool-blend fabric for a smooth drape, they feature a flat front, belt loops, and a modern slim fit. Ideal for business or special events.

name: Silk Geometric Tie
description: Complete your ensemble with this elegant silk tie. Woven from pure silk, it features a subtle geometric pattern that adds a touch of sophistication without overpowering. A classic width suitable for various knot styles.

name: Leather Derby Shoes
description: Step out in style with these classic leather Derby shoes. Expertly crafted from full-grain calfskin leather, they feature a durable Goodyear welt construction, leather lining, and a comfortable fit. The perfect choice for formal occasions.

name: Cashmere Crew Neck Sweater
description: Experience ultimate comfort and luxury with our cashmere crew neck sweater. Knitted from the finest Mongolian cashmere, it's incredibly soft, lightweight, and warm. A timeless classic for sophisticated layering.
